settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: Change Enderchest Color in The End
settings.changeBarColorForPotions: Change Bar Color for Wither & Poison
settings.enableMessageWhenActionPrevented: Show a Message When an Action is Prevented
settings.zealotCounter: Zealot Counter - Count Since Last Eye
settings.showBackpackPreviewInAH: Show Backpack Preview for Your Items While AH is Open
settings.skyblockAddonsButtonInPauseMenu: Show SBA Button in Pause Menu
settings.showZealotsPerEye: Zealot Counter - Show Zealots Per Eye
settings.turnBowGreenWhenUsingToxicArrowPoison: Color Bow Green When Using Toxic Arrow Poison
settings.onlyStopRatSqueak: Only Stop the Rat Squeak Sound
settings.baitListDisplay: Show Bait List While Holding a Rod
settings.rotateMap: Rotate The Map With Your Player's Rotation
settings.showFetchurOnlyInDwarven: Only Show Fetchur's item in the Dwarven Mines
settings.showFetchurInventoryOpenOnly: Only Show Fetchur's item when the Inventory is Open
settings.baseStatBoostPercentage: Show Base Stat Boost for Dungeon Items
settings.showPlayerHeadsOnMap: Show Player Heads on Dungeon Map
settings.showItemDungeonFloor: Show Floor Obtained on Dungeon Items
settings.showRarityUpgraded: Show if Item's Rarity has been Upgraded
settings.dragonsNestOnly: Only Show in the Dragon's Nest
settings.skillActionsLeftUntilNextLevel: Show Actions Left Until Next Level

trevorTheTrapper.title: Trevor the Trapper Features
trevorTheTrapper.showQuestCooldownDescription: This will be displayed above Trevor's head

settings.hideSpawnPointPlayers: Hide Players at Hub Spawn Point
settings.showSkyblockItemId: Show Skyblock Item ID on Hover
settings.resetSalvagedEssencesAfterLeavingMenu: Reset Salvaged Essence Counter After Closing Menu
settings.zealotSpawnAreasOnly: Show Only in Zealot Spawn Areas

messages.dropConfirmation: Drop this item again to confirm!
messages.labymod: Labymod Users: Hide Food, Armor, and Health Bar, is incompatible.
messages.minionCannotReach: A %type% minion cannot reach and has stopped spawning!
messages.minionIsFull: A minion on your island is full!

updateChecker.wantToViewPatchNotes: Need support or want to read the full changelog?
updateChecker.noDownloadAvailable: No download link available, please check our Discord server.

notificationBox.majorAvailable: A new major update (%version%) is available! The link for the download can be found in chat.
notificationBox.betaAvailable: A new beta update (%version%) is available! Look in chat for the download link.
notificationBox.patchAvailable: A new patch update (%version%) is available! Look in chat for download options!

messages.cancelledDropping: A feature has stopped you from dropping this "rare" item or tool from your hotbar.
messages.clickMoreTimes: Click/drop this item %times% more times if you really want to do this.
messages.clickOneMoreTime: Click/drop this item 1 more time if you really want to do this.
messages.switchedSlots: You have just switched from a locked slot or rare item. Please wait a bit before dropping!
messages.clickToOpenFolder: Click to open your mods folder!
messages.firstStatus: This status will appear at the top
messages.secondStatus: This status will appear under your first status
messages.fallbackStatus: This status will appear when your automatic status has nothing to show
messages.bossApproaching: You are close to spawning a boss!
messages.copyModeSet: The developer copy mode has been set to: %mode%. Press "%keyName%" to trigger a data copy!
messages.entityOutlinesRequirement: Requires Shaders, Fast Render, and Antialiasing to be OFF
messages.invalidFeatureConfiguration: Invalid configuration detected for feature %featureName%, resetting its settings to default values.
messages.fileFetchFailed: %modName% has failed to fetch %number% file(s). Please copy the error using the button below and report it in our Discord server.

discordStatus.descriptionPurse: Shows the amount of coins in your purse
discordStatus.descriptionBits: Shows the amount of bits you have
discordStatus.descriptionStats: Shows your HP, Defense and Mana stats
discordStatus.descriptionItem: Shows the name of the item you're holding
discordStatus.descriptionTime: Shows the current Skyblock time. E.g. 12:00am 1st Early Winter
discordStatus.descriptionAuto: Automatically displays a status. E.g. your zealot count while in The End.
discordStatus.descriptionRevenants: Shows that you are doing a Revenant quest.
discordStatus.descriptionSvens: Shows that you are doing a Sven quest.
discordStatus.descriptionTarantula: Shows that you are doing a Tarantula quest.
discordStatus.descriptionVoidgloom: Shows that you are doing a Voidgloom quest.
discordStatus.descriptionInferno: Shows that you are doing an Inferno quest.

enchantLayout.title: Control how enchants are displayed on item tooltips
enchantLayout.descriptionCompress: Compresses enchants into as few lines as possible
enchantLayout.descriptionExpand: Lists each enchant on its own line

copyBlock.help: Copies data about the block that you are looking at

copyEntity.help: Copies NBT data for entities of the given name(s) within the given radius around the player

detailedHelp.description: Copies the NBT data of entities. The types of entities included and the radius around the player to copy data from can be customized. If no options are given, the default settings are used. The default settings are: include players, armor stands, and mobs, and a radius of 3 blocks. If the radius isn't given, the default radius is used.

options.entityNames: Names of the types of entities you want to copy data for (e.g. Player,Creeper). Press "Tab" after typing the command for a full list. Separate multiple names with commas, names are case-sensitive.
options.radius: The radius (in blocks) around the player to copy entity NBT data from

detailedHelp.description: Copies the text displayed in the scoreboard's sidebar display slot

options.formatted: Determines if the formatting codes should be included when copying. Can be either "true" or "false", defaults to "false" if no value is provided. Formatting codes are copied if "true".

copyTabList.help: Copies the tab list header and footer

detailedHelp.description: This command copies the header and footer of the tab player list. Formatting codes are included.
This command toggles the developer mode. This mode is meant for developers of SkyBlock mods & tools. It provides game data such as entity and item NBT.

help.help: Shows this help message. If a command is provided, detailed help about that command is shown.

options.command: The sub-command to get detailed usage for

printDeaths.help: Prints the counts stored in the dungeon death counters for debugging purposes.

reload.help: Reloads all of the mod's settings and resources. The game will freeze for a few seconds.

reloadRes.help: Reloads the mod's resources. The game will freeze for a few seconds.

resetZealotCounter.help: Resets all the zealot counter counts.

detailedHelp.description: Manually sets counts in the zealot counter.

options.zealots: Zealots killed since the last summoning eye drop

slayer.help: Manually sets slayer stats, press tab for arguments

detailedHelp.description: Manually sets slayer stats, press tab for arguments

options.number: Number to set the stat to
options.stat: Slayer stat to change, can be "kills" or the name of a dropped item formatted like this: "REVENANT_FLESH"

toggleMagmaTimerLogging.help: Toggles logging magma boss timer debug messages

dev.enabled: Developer mode enabled! TIP: Press "%keyName%" to copy NBT data!

folder.error: An error occurred while trying to open the mods folder: %s

zealotCounter.eyesSet: Set total summoning eye count to %number%!

slayer.bossRequired: You need to select a boss! Please choose %bosses%
slayer.statRequired: You need to select a stat. Press tab for options.
slayer.numberRequired: You need to add the number you want.
slayer.killsSet: Kills for slayer %boss% was set to %number%.
slayer.statSet: Statistic %stat% for slayer %boss% was set to %number%.

toggleActionBarLogging.disabled: Action bar messages will no longer be logged.
toggleActionBarLogging.enabled: Action bar messages will now be logged.

toggleMagmaTimerLogging.disabled: Magma boss timer messages will no longer be logged.
toggleMagmaTimerLogging.enabled: Magma boss timer messages will now be logged.
